header.headline: Our Focus
header.description: Our investments are focused on fast-growing industries and market verticals that represent high potential return on equity.

foci.title: Automotive Tech
foci.description: Automotive technology, primarily “Off Vehicle” Tech, that can be added to or integrated with the OEM platforms, or Automotive Technologies that can potentially be purchased by the automakers or the tier-one suppliers.

foci.title: B2B, B2C, & H2H Platforms
foci.description: Business to Business scalable applications that are built on a SaaS (Software as a Service) platform for fast and easy adoption.

foci.title: FinTech
foci.description: Scalable financial technology that aims to compete with traditional financial methods in delivery, process, and transaction, especially in the application of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence and their role in the future financial market.

foci.title: Wearable Tech
foci.description: Specifically, technologies that are intended for commercial use by law enforcement, military personnel, and safety / high-risk construction and maintenance crews.

foci.title: Technology in Motion & Mobility
foci.description: Software that is designed to be used on mobile devices that can be integrated with business systems that are in constant motion.

foci.title: Medical & Health Tech
foci.description: Technology applications that are designed for pre- & post-procedural interactions. Applications that improve the patients' experience and reduce the cost of the health system while increasing revenue.

foci.title: Blockchain
foci.description: Focusing on Blockchain applications in the decentralizing infrastructure space, streamlining a business process that is in a higher-level need of visibility and verification applications.

foci.title: AgriTech
foci.description: Agri-Tech companies and technologies that introduce a new and innovative way to supplement and convert old-fashioned farming technology that increase yields, quality, and health of everyday produce while dramatically reducing traditional operating costs.
